Dear Student_E,

Thank you for checking in again, and for your continued interest in School_E.

At this time, there has not been a change in our seat availability, and we cannot reliably predict whether an opening will occur in the near term. We will continue to keep your file on record should our situation change.

If you receive objective updates in the next round or two, please submit them as soon as they are available (same day is ideal). Preferred format:
1) Grades/transcript: PDF (or clear scanned image) showing your name, term, and course/grade information.
2) Recommendation: a signed letter on school/organization letterhead as a PDF, or sent directly by the recommender from an official email address.
3) Awards/achievements: brief list in the email body, with any supporting documentation attached if available.

You may send updates by replying in this thread and attaching the documents; no additional statement is required unless there is a major change you want to explain.

Sincerely,
School_E Admissions
